/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the highway, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The highway itself is divided by a median, and there are trees lining both sides, adding a touch of green to the otherwise urban landscape. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, perhaps leading to another part of the city. On the right side of the highway, there's a billboard, a common sight in bustling cities. The image does not contain any text. The relative positions of the objects suggest a typical day in a city, with the sun high in the sky and the city alive with activity.
